sourcesContent:
import {
  Heading,
  Stack,
  Box,
  Divider,
  Text,
  SimpleGrid,
  Button,
} from '@chakra-ui/core';
import Layout from '../../components/layout/Layout';
import Tema from './Tema';

const Content = ({ head, text, children }) => {
  return (
    <Stack spacing={8}>
      <Box p={5} shadow='md' borderWidth='1px'>
        <Heading fontSize='xl'>{head}</Heading>
        <Text mt={4}>{text}</Text>

        {children}
      </Box>
    </Stack>
  );
};
export default (props) => {
  return (
    <Layout>
      <Heading as='h2' size='lg'>
        Nombre del Curso
      </Heading>
      <Divider></Divider>

      <SimpleGrid columns={2} spacing={2}>
        <Box>
          <SimpleGrid columns={2} spacing={2}>
            <Box>
              <Content head='Duracion' text={'20 Hrs'}></Content>
            </Box>
            <Box>
              <Content head='Precio' text='$300.00MXN'></Content>
            </Box>
          </SimpleGrid>
          <SimpleGrid columns={1} spacing={2}>
            <Box>
              <Content
                head='Descripcion'
                text={'Aqui va la descrpcion del curso'}
              ></Content>
            </Box>
            <Box>
              <Content head='Temario'>
                {Array(1, 2, 3, 4).map((item) => (
                  <Tema title={'Tema ' + item} key={item}></Tema>
                ))}
              </Content>
            </Box>
          </SimpleGrid>
        </Box>

        <Box>
          <SimpleGrid columns={1} spacing={2}>
            <Box>
              <Content head='Video' text='Aqui iria el video'>
                <Divider></Divider>
                <Button variant='outline' isFullWidth={true}>
                  Comprar Curso
                </Button>
              </Content>
            </Box>
          </SimpleGrid>
          <Divider></Divider>
          <SimpleGrid columns={2} spacing={2}>
            <Box>
              <Content
                head='Categoria'
                text='Tecnologia / Progrmación'
              ></Content>
            </Box>
          </SimpleGrid>
        </Box>
      </SimpleGrid>

      <Content></Content>
    </Layout>
  );
};
